statements: UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50, status = 'processed' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50, status = 'completed' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

UPDATE transactions SET timestamp = '2023-05-10 15:30:00', amount = 75.25, status = 'pending' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002'
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE flagged_transactions SET flag_status = TRUE, flag_reason = 'Fraudulent Activity' WHERE flagged_transaction_id = 54321;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.25, transaction_date = '2022-10-12 15:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE flagged_transactions SET flag_reason = 'Suspicious Activity Detected', flag_status = true, flagged_date = '2022-10-12 16:45:00' WHERE flagged_transaction_id = 2001;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE users SET address = '123 Main St' WHERE user_id = 98765;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.00, transaction_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE user_id = 12345 AND transaction_id = 98765;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', full_name = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50, is_suspicious = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE users SET email = 'example@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE user_id = 5678;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 100, is_suspicious = true WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 50.25 WHERE user_id = 67890;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50, type = 'deposit' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE customers SET name = 'John Doe', address = '123 Main St', phone_number = '555-1234' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.75, type = 'purchase' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance + 100.50, account_type = 'savings' WHERE account_id = 2004;
